name: ads
description: SAP Forms service by Adobe lets you generate print and interactive forms using Adobe Document Services (ADS). Call the service from your application using a REST API for rendering documents and for managing form templates in the template store. Configure ADS and access the template store via service-offered UIs. To use Forms service by Adobe, you must subscribe to the application (ads-configui) and set entitlements to both, the ADS (ads) and the REST API template store (adsrestapi) service. In the Service Marketplace, find all two tiles easily by entering 'adobe' into the search field.

servicePlans.name: free
servicePlans.description: Test and explore the features provided by the Forms service by Adobe. The usage of service plan Free is limited to six months. After six months, SAP has the right to delete free tier instances and data. Only community support is available for free tier service plans, and these are not subject to service level agreements (SLAs). Service plan Free is subject to additional terms and conditions as provided in the Business Technology Platform Supplemental Terms and Conditions.

servicePlans.name: standard
servicePlans.description: Connect the Forms service to an ABAP system. For example,  to SAP BTP, ABAP Environment or to an S/4HANA on-premise system. To be able to use this entitlement, you must select also the default (Application) entitlement.
